note: DOB 2/18/1967, (she/they)I have schizophrenia & live on the US East Coast (Connecticut) but I am a resident of the library of babel, I am a trans girl, and I have been out for two years, into amateur astronomy and reading (mostly nonfiction) formerly worked in outdoor education and currently looking for work. Physics background, Deadhead (followed the Grateful Dead in the 1980s and 1990s), Socialist or SocDem (depends on what will work) pansexual once in a while NSFW. I probably post too much.

fields.name: #LGBTQIA+
fields.value: #Queer Issues
